data.title: Algeciras Port Community COMPORT on LinkedIn: #sustainable #algeciras #commodities #importexport #logistics #investment…
data.meta_description: 🗓️ Some weeks ago, Access World, the global logistics leader, announced an exciting investment of €5M💶to construct a 6000 sqm #sustainable 🌿warehouse in…
data.text:
We are excited to welcome Sociedad de Estiba Algeciras, C.P.E to LinkedIn! 🎉 La Sociedad de Estiba del Puerto Bahía de Algeciras is one of the members of our association and bring together all licensed stevedoring companies in Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras. Their mission is to provide #specialized labour for #stevedoring tasks to their clients, ensuring #effectiveness, #efficiency, and #competitiveness. Check out their first post below and connect with them to stay updated on their latest insights and contributions. We look forward to seeing their continued success and engagement! 🚀 #Welcome #LinkedIn #NewConnection #Networking #Community

Celebrating #25Years of Maritime Excellence with COMPORT! Algeciras Port Community COMPORT, the Port Community Association of Algeciras Bay, celebrated its #25thanniversary during the annual assembly at Cámara de Comercio del Campo de Gibraltar. This milestone event brought together 160 member companies, showcasing the strong #community and cooperation that define COMPORT. Jose Tejedor, President of the association, emphasized the sense of belonging and collaboration that promotes Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras internationally. Gerardo Landaluce, Chairman of the Port Authority, highlighted the achievements and #teamwork that have driven the port's success. The event also featured the "Association of Families of Alzheimer's Patients (AFA) of Algeciras," recognizing their 25 years of collaboration with the Port Authority. A video commemorating COMPORT's history was shown, and past presidents were honored for their contributions. The Port of Algeciras, now among the Top-4 European ports in cargo volume, owes its success to the dedication of the entire team. After the formal event, attendees enjoyed a day of camaraderie, reinforcing the community spirit that defines COMPORT. Here's to many more years of growth and success! 💪🎉 More details 👉 https://lnkd.in/dj_ijiiP

Just a few weeks ago, Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras was celebrated as the #mostefficientport in Europe and secured a spot in the Top-10 globally, according to the Container Port Performance Index 2023 by The World Bank and S&P Global 🌍🏆. Now, let's talk about connectivity. Maintaining its remarkable performance, Algeciras ranks N.5️⃣ in Europe for #MaritimeConnectivity in the latest Port Liner Shipping Connectivity Index (PLSCI) by UN Trade and Development (UNCTAD). With a significant score increase this quarter, Algeciras leads ahead of major ports in Europe 🇪🇺, reinforcing its position as a competitive #hub in the Mediterranean. This achievement not only highlights our strategic operational excellence but also underscores #PortofAlgeciras's pivotal role in enhancing #GlobalTrade opportunities and economic growth for the region. 🚢🌐 More info here: https://lnkd.in/diJjBfjc

🎉 Join us in celebrating this milestone! 🎉 Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras is once again recognized as the #mostefficientport in Europe and ranks in the Top-10 globally, according to the Container Port Performance Index 2023 by The World Bank and S&P Global.🌍🏆 🚢📈 Algeciras has climbed to 9th place worldwide and 12th from an administrative perspective. This achievement underscores our resilience and efficiency in a challenging year for global trade. 🌐💪 From Algeciras Port Community COMPORT, we would like also to highlight the effort and dedication of all the stakeholders involved. 👏💼 “𝘛𝘩𝘦𝘴𝘦 𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘴 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘧𝘪𝘳𝘮 𝘵𝘩𝘦 #𝘚𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘪𝘵𝘰𝘧𝘎𝘪𝘣𝘳𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘢𝘳 𝘢𝘴 𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘣𝘦𝘴𝘵-𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵 𝘻𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘴 𝘪𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘭𝘥 𝘪𝘯 𝘢 𝘺𝘦𝘢𝘳 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘨𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘴𝘶𝘱𝘱𝘭𝘺 𝘤𝘩𝘢𝘪𝘯 𝘥𝘪𝘴𝘳𝘶𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴.” - Gerardo Landaluce, Algeciras Port Chairman More info 👉 https://lnkd.in/dArTBHpf APM Terminals TTI ALGECIRAS #GlobalTrade #MaritimeLogistics #Efficiency #CPPI2023 🚢🌍📊

📢 Algeciras Port Community COMPORT at Posidonia 2024! 🌊⚓ We're thrilled to announce our participation in Posidonia Events 2024, one of the top maritime fairs, held in #Athens this week. Visit us at our stand (Hall 3-3202), where our robust delegation of 60 professionals from 30 companies will showcase the excellence in maritime services. Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras is renowned for its variety, safety, quality, and competitive pricing, serving 120,000 vessels annually through the Strait of Gibraltar. Discover why we are a global leader in ship services, including agencies, repairs, provisioning, crew changes, maritime law, MARPOL services, supply, and bunkering. Join us and connect with: Pérez y Cía. Group, Aguaservi | Alfaship | ASG Shipping | BACOMAR | Bayport | BMT Repairs | Cadiship Shipping and Logistic Agents | Crosscomar | De Castro Gabinete Jurídico | Dino Theo Atlantis MC | Elcome International LLC | Gas Marine Pro | GIBUNCO SHIP AGENCY | IBERICA MARITIMA | Jason Marine Group Limited Electronics | Lemmas | Maritime Pacific | Maritime Ship Cleaning Spain | Mertramar | NeKo Ship Supply BV | Next Maritime | Peninsula | REPARACIONES MARITIMAS ESPAÑOLAS SA (REMESA) | Seapoole Marine Services | Sandvik Marine Electronics SL | SCAMP MARINE SL | TRAMARCO | Transbull Cádiz, S.l. | and ZENER MARINE ELEVATOR SERVICES. Let’s make #Posidonia2024 unforgettable! Know us more: https://lnkd.in/enCSV2js #PortofAlgeciras #MaritimeExcellence #APBA #COMPORT #ShippingIndustry

𝓦𝓱𝓪𝓽 𝓪 𝓦𝓮𝓮𝓴! We are thrilled to share some fantastic updates highlighting the growth and dynamism of our port and region: 🌱 𝔾ℝ𝔼𝔼ℕ 𝕀ℕℕ𝕆𝕍𝔸𝕋𝕀𝕆ℕ𝕊 🔋 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras has approved DRAGADOS OFFSHORE's concession for constructing offshore wind energy platforms in the port. This project will create approximately 1,000 jobs and position the Algeciras Bay as a key player in #renewableenergy. 📈 ℝ𝔼ℂ𝕆ℝ𝔻 𝔸ℂℍ𝕀𝔼𝕍𝔼𝕄𝔼ℕ𝕋𝕊 🚢 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐆𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐭𝐡 𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜 In the first four months of 2024, the Port of Algeciras moved 36 million tons of cargo, a 3% increase from last year. This growth is driven by a rise in #containerizedtraffic, which increased by 3.6% to over 1.58 million TEUs, and an 11.5% increase in #liquidbulk. 💼 𝐑𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐫𝐝-𝐁𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐜í𝐚 #Andalucía achieved a historic milestone with €10.484 billion in exports during the first quarter of 2024, marking a 1% year-on-year increase despite a national decline. Andalucía TRADE 👥 ℂ𝕆𝕄𝕄𝕌ℕ𝕀𝕋𝕐 ℍ𝕀𝔾ℍ𝕃𝕀𝔾ℍ𝕋𝕊 🥑 𝐒𝐮𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐀𝐯𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐝𝐨 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 The third edition of the Avocado Technical Conference in Algeciras was a success, focusing on knowledge sharing and fostering commercial relationships within the avocado sector. 📦 𝐀𝐥𝐠𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐫𝐚𝐬 𝐁𝐞𝐭𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐨 At Breakbulk Events & Media Europe 2024, Algeciras emphasized its commitment to diversifying traffic with project cargo, showcasing its strategic efforts in this segment. 👩⚖️ 𝐈𝐬𝐚𝐛𝐞𝐥 𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐥á𝐧 𝐑𝐨𝐜𝐡𝐚 𝐁𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐬 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐖𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐫 𝐂𝐥𝐮𝐛 𝐢𝐧 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐢𝐧 Congratulations to Isabel Millan Rocha, Regional Manager Andalucía for ROMEU Y CIA, and WISTA SPAIN Member, on becoming the first woman to lead the Propeller Algeciras Club. Her leadership marks a new era for the organization. International Propeller Club - WISTA International 🌍 𝐋𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐃𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐀𝐥𝐠𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐫𝐚𝐬 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭 On Friday, Algeciras Port hosted the Mission #PortLeaders, an initiative by Maritime Policy Bureau and PR PORTS LLC. The event aimed to strengthen ties between #LatinAmerican and Spanish port communities. Delegates from Argentina, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, Panama, Peru, the Dominican Republic, and Venezuela explored key installations and participated in discussions about public-private institutional collaboration and other activities. Nestlé - Cormagdalena - AECOM - Asotep Ecuador - Autoridad Portuaria de Puerto Bolivar - Grupo Véjar - Tisur - #APORDOM - INEA - Instituto Nacional de los Espacios Acuaticos - PTP Group Logistics - #BOLIPUERTOS

This week we are in Mexico!🇲🇽 This mission, supported by Cámara de Comercio del Campo de Gibraltar, Andalucía TRADE, Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras and Algeciras Port Community COMPORT, aims to enhance international promotion for local SMEs. The delegation attended a business day in #MexicoCity with Mexican logistics and customs associations. The mission continues with presentations on #AlgecirasPort services and B2B meetings, concluding with business visits in #Veracruz. #COMPORT participants include ecs360logistics, LOGISTIKA360 SL, Comercio Exterior Souto S.L., Operinter Andalucía, and ZENER MARINE ELEVATOR SERVICES SL. This activity is part of the PYME Global program by Spanish Chamber of Commerce, co-financed by the EU Regional Development Fund (FEDER). More info: https://lnkd.in/dQVDnVjn

🚢 Algeciras Port Leads Spain in Maritime Connectivity Growth for Q1 2024 🚢 According to the latest data from UNCTAD and MDSTransmodal, Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras has achieved the highest increase in maritime connectivity in Spain for the first quarter of 2024. This achievement is thanks to our strategic position and the effective response to the challenges in the Red Sea crisis, bolstering our competitiveness in the Mediterranean region. #Algeciras now ranks 5th in Europe for connectivity, surpassing major ports like Piraeus, Bremerhaven, Le Havre or Barcelona. This growth also contributes significantly to #Spain maintaining its status as the European country with the highest #maritimeconnectivity, highlighting our crucial role in global maritime logistics. Read here: https://lnkd.in/dSnWcQvE

🌍 𝗔𝗹𝗴𝗲𝗰𝗶𝗿𝗮𝘀+𝗧𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗲𝗱: 𝗣𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗟𝗼𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 🚀 As global trade faces challenges and crises, the alliance between 🇪🇸 Autoridad Portuaria Bahía de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras and 🇲🇦 Tanger Med (Official Account) - TMSA shines as a prime example of #cooperation and #strategicplanning. It highlights the crucial role of the #StraitofGibraltar🌉 in the world's supply chains. This partnership is redefining industry dynamics, particularly for the automotive and textile sectors, amid increasing trade flows and the imperative of #nearshoring practices by giants like Renault Group and Inditex. 📈 ꜰɪᴠᴇ ʏᴇᴀʀꜱ ᴏꜰ ɢʀᴏᴡᴛʜ ᴀɴᴅ ɪɴɴᴏᴠᴀᴛɪᴏɴ Both ports have significantly expanded their infrastructure and volumes during this time, showcasing the power of cooperation in enhancing regional and European trade #connectivity. Despite their competitive stance in container transshipment, their combined achievements in 2023 -430,000 trucks, 226 million tonnes of traffic, and 13.3 million TEUs - underline the critical role of this maritime corridor in a challenging global landscape. 🌱 ᴀ ɢʀᴇᴇɴ ᴀɴᴅ ᴇꜰꜰɪᴄɪᴇɴᴛ ᴍᴀʀɪᴛɪᴍᴇ ʟɪɴᴋ This partnership is not just about volume; it's about setting a precedent for sustainable and digitized logistics, emphasizing #green initiatives and technological advancements to optimize cargo transportation. The #HerculesPlan, with a committed investment of €200 million, marks a significant step towards improving #roro traffic efficiency and connectivity, bolstering #Algeciras's position as a #gateway to Europe and the Mediterranean. More details 👉 https://lnkd.in/dExmzM5q ASMEX, A.P. Moller - Maersk, XPO Logistics Europe; DFDS
